name: Troll Scripts
short_description:
This project is dedicated to creating a rich repository of scripts that make your computer do humorous things, ie. repeatedly opening the cd drive or singing songs to you at random intervals. Please note that these scripts are FOR ENTERTAINMENT PURPOSES ONLY. Do not install them on any computer without permission, and do not submit any code that could be deemed "malicious" under the SourceForge terms of service.
Neither we nor SourceForge assume any responsibility for damage caused, lost productivity, or other consequences arising from the use of these scripts. Once again, these are only for entertainment, and you use them at you own risk.
summary: Fun code to make your computer misbehave
